name: Space Janitor (Xenofell)
description:
Unlimited green energy is great. No more pollution. Farewell to the fossil fuels. But it doesn't come for free. Take the role of Unit 47, one of hundreds of robots assigned to gather minerals from asteroids in space. The reason? The Dyson Sphere surrounding The Sun, which provides Earth with unlimited sustainable energy, requires constant maintenance, and that requires resources.

Follow Commander Elaine's instructions and do your part for the sustainable future of humanity!

... And watch out for spoopy space ghosts.

Controls

WASDStandard thrust movement ShiftAfterburners SpacebarSpacebrakes TabToggle map region EscapePause Left mouseFIRE

Credits

XenofellProgramming NereidaCute GF Artist FridouwBae Artist DeziBae Tester

Notes

  • No audio. Sorry, I ran out of time. I wanted to focus on tight gameplay. Next time!
  • This is our first game jam! Be gentle, but also, give us all the feedback. We'd love to hear it.
  • Most importantly: have fun!
